title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Designing ICT-Integrated Pedagogical Approaches for Engineering Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering theories and practical field experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can simulate engineering problem-solving processes using ICT tools based on activity theory
Learners can perform 80% or more of collaborative activities with peers through online discussion platforms and mobile apps
Learners enhance their ability to apply engineering theories to real-world cases through real-time competitive quizzes and performance-sharing activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
